definitions: the action of keeping away from or not doing something

examples.text: one third of cancer deaths could be prevented by avoidance of smoking

shortDefinitions: action of keeping away from or not doing something

definitions: the action of preventing something from happening

examples.text: a pilotless passenger aircraft would rely on computers and automatic collision avoidance

definitions: the action of repudiating, nullifying, or rendering void a decree or contract

examples.text: insurance underwriters could not rely on non-disclosure to justify avoidance of the contract

shortDefinitions: action of nullifying decree or contract
